org.wtc.eclipse.platform.helpers
Interface IEditorHelper

All Known Implementing Classes:
GenericEditorHelperImplAdapter
public interface IEditorHelper

Helper for manipulating files through the source editor.

Method Detail

findAndReplaceAll

void findAndReplaceAll(IUIContext ui,
                       IPath filePath,
                       java.lang.String searchString,
                       java.lang.String replaceString)
findAndReplaceAll - Open the given file, search for the provided string and replace it with the given replacement value.

Parameters:
ui - - Driver for UI generated input
filePath - - Full path (project included) of the file to edit. Ex: RuntimeTestProject/src/folder/MyFile.jsp
searchString - - Search for this string
replaceString - - Replace the search string with this string

findAndReplaceAll

void findAndReplaceAll(IUIContext ui,
                       IPath filePath,
                       java.lang.String searchString,
                       java.lang.String replaceString,
                       boolean useRegex)
findAndReplaceAll - Open the given file, search for the provided string and replace it with the given replacement value.

Parameters:
ui - - Driver for UI generated input
filePath - - Full path (project included) of the file to edit. Ex: RuntimeTestProject/src/folder/MyFile.jsp
searchString - - Search for this string
replaceString - - Replace the search string with this string
useRegex - - True if the search string is to check the regular expression checkbox on the find and replace dialog; false if that checkbox is to be unchecked

                         java.lang.String searchString,
                         java.lang.String replaceString)

Parameters:
ui - - Driver for UI generated input
filePath - - Full path (project included) of the file to edit. Ex: RuntimeTestProject/src/folder/MyFile.jsp
searchString - - Search for this string
replaceString - - Replace the search string with this string

findAndReplaceOccurrences

void findAndReplaceOccurrences(IUIContext ui,
                               IPath filePath,
                               java.lang.String searchString,
                               java.lang.String replaceString,
                               int numberOfOccurrences)
findAndReplaceOccurrences- Open the given file, search for the provided string and replace it the specified number of times with the given replacement value.

Parameters:
ui - - Driver for UI generated input
filePath - - Full path (project included) of the file to edit. Ex: RuntimeTestProject/src/folder/MyFile.jsp
searchString - - Search for this string
replaceString - - Replace the search string with this string
numberOfOccurrences - - the number of times to replace the pattern

findFirst

void findFirst(IUIContext ui,
               java.lang.String searchString)
findFirst - Use the "Find/Replace" dialog to find the first occurrence of the given search string in the active editor.

Parameters:
ui - - Driver for UI generated input
searchString - - String to find in the active text editor

getActiveEditor

IEditorPart getActiveEditor(IUIContext ui)
getActiveEditor - Internal use only method to get the active editor in the workbench. This method will issue a TestCase failure if the active editor cannot be determined for any reason

Parameters:
ui - - Driver for UI-generated input
Returns:
IEditorPart - The view part of the active editor

getCursorLocation

int getCursorLocation(IUIContext ui)
getCursorLocation - Return the cursor offset of the active text editor. This method will issue a TestCase failure if there is no active ITextEditor

Parameters:
ui - - Driver for UI generated input
Returns:
int - Cursor offset of current text editor

gotoLine

void gotoLine(IUIContext ui,
              int line)
gotoLine - Use the "Go to Line" to place the cursor at a line location in the active editor.

Parameters:
ui - - Driver for UI generated input
line - - The line number to place the cursor at. Should be within the bounds of the length of the file

insertBlock

void insertBlock(IUIContext ui,
                 Plugin sourcePlugin,
                 IPath fromFilePath,
                 IPath toFilePath,
                 java.lang.String text,
                 IEditorHelper.Placement placement)
insertBlock - Use keystrokes to enter a block of text into the file at the given workspace location. Get the block of text from the plugin resource at the given plugin path. Insert the block into the active editor at a position relative to the given search string. This test will issue a TestCase failure if any of the resources cannot be accessed for any reason

Parameters:
ui - - Driver for UI generated input
sourcePlugin - - Plugin containing the resource that defines the text to be inserted
fromFilePath - - The plugin-relative path (plugin NOT included) to the resource of the text to insert. Ex: resources/testfiles/FromFile.jsp
toFilePath - - Full path (project included) to the file in the workspace that is to be edited. Ex: RuntimeTestProject/src/folder/ToFile.jsp
text - - Text to search in the active editor. This method will find the first occurrence of this string in the active editor
placement - - Position relative to the search string in the active file (i.e. - before, after, instead of)

insertBlock

void insertBlock(IUIContext ui,
                 Plugin sourcePlugin,
                 IPath fromFilePath,
                 IPath toFilePath,
                 int line,
                 int column)
insertBlock - Use keystrokes to enter a block of text into the file at the given workspace location. Get the block of text from the plugin resource at the given plugin path. Insert the block into the active editor at a fixed line, column position. This test will issue a TestCase failure if any of the resources cannot be accessed for any reason

Parameters:
ui - - Driver for UI generated input
sourcePlugin - - Plugin containing the resource that defines the text to be inserted
fromFilePath - - The plugin-relative path (plugin NOT included) to the resource of the text to insert. Ex: resources/testfiles/FromFile.jsp
toFilePath - - Full path (project included) to the file in the workspace that is to be edited. Ex: RuntimeTestProject/src/folder/ToFile.jsp
line - - The line number on which the new text shall be inserted
column - - The column number on the given line to which the new text shall be inserted

insertBlock

void insertBlock(IUIContext ui,
                 Plugin sourcePlugin,
                 IPath fromFilePath,
                 IPath toFilePath,
                 java.lang.String text,
                 IEditorHelper.Placement placement,
                 boolean save)
insertBlock - Use keystrokes to enter a block of text into the file at the given workspace location. Get the block of text from the plugin resource at the given plugin path. Insert the block into the active editor at a position relative to the given search string. This test will issue a TestCase failure if any of the resources cannot be accessed for any reason

Parameters:
ui - - Driver for UI generated input
sourcePlugin - - Plugin containing the resource that defines the text to be inserted
fromFilePath - - The plugin-relative path (plugin NOT included) to the resource of the text to insert. Ex: resources/testfiles/FromFile.jsp
toFilePath - - Full path (project included) to the file in the workspace that is to be edited. Ex: RuntimeTestProject/src/folder/ToFile.jsp
text - - Text to search in the active editor. This method will find the first occurrence of this string in the active editor
placement - - Position relative to the search string in the active file (i.e. - before, after, instead of)
save - - True if this edit should save the editor after insert; false if the editor should not be saved

insertBlock

void insertBlock(IUIContext ui,
                 Plugin sourcePlugin,
                 IPath fromFilePath,
                 IPath toFilePath,
                 int line,
                 int column,
                 boolean save)
insertBlock - Use keystrokes to enter a block of text into the file at the given workspace location. Get the block of text from the plugin resource at the given plugin path. Insert the block into the active editor at a fixed line, column position. This test will issue a TestCase failure if any of the resources cannot be accessed for any reason

Parameters:
ui - - Driver for UI generated input
sourcePlugin - - Plugin containing the resource that defines the text to be inserted
fromFilePath - - The plugin-relative path (plugin NOT included) to the resource of the text to insert. Ex: resources/testfiles/FromFile.jsp
toFilePath - - Full path (project included) to the file in the workspace that is to be edited. Ex: RuntimeTestProject/src/folder/ToFile.jsp
line - - The line number on which the new text shall be inserted
column - - The column number on the given line to which the new text shall be inserted
save - - True if this edit should save the editor after insert; false if the editor should not be saved

insertString

void insertString(IUIContext ui,
                  java.lang.String insertText,
                  IPath toFilePath,
                  java.lang.String text,
                  IEditorHelper.Placement placement)
insertString - Use keystrokes to enter the given insertText into the file at the given workspace location. Insert the block into the active editor at a position relative to the given search string. This test will issue a TestCase failure if any of the resources cannot be accessed for any reason

Parameters:
ui - - Driver for UI generated input
insertText - - the text to insert
toFilePath - - Full path (project included) to the file in the workspace that is to be edited. Ex: RuntimeTestProject/src/folder/ToFile.jsp
text - - Text to search in the active editor. This method will find the first occurrence of this string in the active editor
placement - - Position relative to the search string in the active file (i.e. - before, after, instead of)

insertString

void insertString(IUIContext ui,
                  java.lang.String insertText,
                  IPath toFilePath,
                  int offset,
                  boolean save)
insertString - Use keystrokes to enter the given insertText into the file at the given workspace location. Insert the block into the active editor at a position given by a character offset. This test will issue a TestCase failure if any of the resources cannot be accessed for any reason

Parameters:
ui - - Driver for UI generated input
insertText - - the text to insert
toFilePath - - Full path (project included) to the file in the workspace that is to be edited. Ex: RuntimeTestProject/src/folder/ToFile.jsp
offset - - The character offset at which the text will be inserted
save - - True if this edit should save the editor after insert; false if the editor should not be saved

insertString

void insertString(IUIContext ui,
                  java.lang.String insertText,
                  IPath toFilePath,
                  java.lang.String text,
                  IEditorHelper.Placement placement,
                  boolean save)
insertString - Use keystrokes to enter the given insertText into the file at the given workspace location. Insert the block into the active editor at a position relative to the given search string. This test will issue a TestCase failure if any of the resources cannot be accessed for any reason

Parameters:
ui - - Driver for UI generated input
insertText - - the text to insert
toFilePath - - Full path (project included) to the file in the workspace that is to be edited. Ex: RuntimeTestProject/src/folder/ToFile.jsp
text - - Text to search in the active editor. This method will find the first occurrence of this string in the active editor
placement - - Position relative to the search string in the active file (i.e. - before, after, instead of)
save - - True if this edit should save the editor after insert; false if the editor should not be saved

insertString

void insertString(IUIContext ui,
                  java.lang.String insertText,
                  IPath toFilePath,
                  int line,
                  int column,
                  boolean save)
insertString - Use keystrokes to enter the given insertText into the file at the given workspace location. Insert the block into the active editor at a position given by a line-column position. This test will issue a TestCase failure if any of the resources cannot be accessed for any reason

Parameters:
ui - - Driver for UI generated input
insertText - - the text to insert
toFilePath - - Full path (project included) to the file in the workspace that is to be edited. Ex: RuntimeTestProject/src/folder/ToFile.jsp
line - - The line number on which the new text shall be inserted
column - - The column number on the given line to which the new text shall be inserted
save - - True if this edit should save the editor after insert; false if the editor should not be saved

openFileInTextEditor

void openFileInTextEditor(IUIContext ui,
                          IPath filePath)
Opens a file in a Text Editor view.

Parameters:
ui - - Driver for UI-generated input
filePath - - Full path (project included) to the file in the workspace that is to be opened. Ex: RuntimeTestProject/src/folder/ToFile.jsp

placeCursor

void placeCursor(IUIContext ui,
                 int offset)
placeCursor - Set the cursor of the active text editor to the given offset. This method will issue a TestCase failure if there is no active ITextEditor

Parameters:
ui - - Driver for UI generated input
offset - - the offset position from the beginning of the file

placeCursor

void placeCursor(IUIContext ui,
                 int line,
                 int column)
placeCursor - Set the cursor of the active text editor to the given line and column. This method will issue a TestCase failure if there is no active ITextEditor

Parameters:
ui - - Driver for UI generated input
line - - Line number to place the cursor at. Should be within the bounds of the current file length
column - - Column number to place the cursor at. Should be within the bounds of the current file length

placeCursorAfter

void placeCursorAfter(IUIContext ui,
                      java.lang.String searchString)
placeCursorAfter - Set the cursor of the active text editor to the position after the given search string. This method will issue a TestCase failure if there is no active ITextEditor

Parameters:
ui - - Driver for UI generated input
searchString - - Text to find in the active source editor
